datasets.name: 82c4e3b5
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       ifnull(table_name, '') as `Target Table`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Run Start Time`,
       event_timestamp as `Error Time`,
       error_log_message as `Error Message in Log`,
       error_message as `Error Message`,
       (CASE WHEN error_code is NULL THEN '<NONE>' WHEN error_code='' THEN '<N/A>' ELSE error_code END) as `Error Code`,
       error_full as `Error Details`
FROM events_errors AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id)
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC

datasets.name: c91619f8
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_link as `Pipeline`, 
       latest_event_timestamp as `Observability data freshness`,
       current_timestamp() as `Check time`,
       (current_timestamp() - latest_event_timestamp) as `Latency at check time`
FROM (SELECT pipeline_id,
            pipeline_link,
            max(event_timestamp) AS latest_event_timestamp
      FROM event_logs_bronze LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
      WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
            AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
                  OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
                  OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
      GROUP BY 1,2)
ORDER BY latest_event_timestamp

datasets.name: 2660d018
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       event_timestamp as `Event Time`,
       ifnull(num_output_rows, 0) as `Appended Rows`,
       ifnull(num_upserted_rows, 0) as `Upserted Rows`,
       ifnull(num_deleted_rows, 0) as `Deleted Rows`,
       ifnull(num_output_bytes, 0) as `Appended Bytes`,
       ifnull(num_written_rows, 0) as `Total Changes`
FROM events_table_metrics AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND (num_written_rows IS NOT NULL)
     AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
          OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
          OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: 5ef35e45
queryLines:
SELECT '<None>' as tag_value
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT tag_value
FROM (SELECT explode(tags_array) as tag_value
      FROM monitored_pipelines)

datasets.name: 6740610b
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_id
FROM monitored_pipelines
WHERE (:tag_value = '<All>')
      OR (:tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
      OR (array_contains(tags_array, :tag_value))

datasets.name: 8897fc81
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Start Time`,
       event_timestamp as `Warning Time`,
       warning_log_message as `Warning Log Message`
FROM events_warnings AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC

datasets.name: 2faba057
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_id as `Pipeline Id`,
       pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       hour as `Hour`,
       num_errors as `Number of Errors`
FROM metric_pipeline_error_rate AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND (hour >= :event_range.min AND hour <= :event_range.max)
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: 5e3eb18f
queryLines:
SELECT event_timestamp
FROM event_logs_bronze
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)

datasets.name: 248b74c6
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       latest_pipeline_run_link as `Latest Run`,
       latest_state_with_color as `Latest State`,
       latest_table_schema as `Latest Schema`,
       current_timestamp() as `Last Data Refresh Time`,
       latest_changes_time as `Latest Changes Time`,
       timestampdiff(SECOND, latest_changes_time, current_timestamp()) as `Seconds Since Latest Change`,
       latest_error_time as `Time of Latest Error`,
       latest_error_code as `Code of Latest Error`,
       latest_error_log_message as `Log Message of Latest Error`,
       latest_error_message as `Message of Latest Error`,
       latest_error_pipeline_run_link as `Latest Pipeline Run with Error`,
       updated_at as `Last Updated`,
       timestampdiff(SECOND, updated_at, current_timestamp()) as `Seconds Since Latest Status Update`
FROM table_status AS ts
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (updated_at >= :event_range.min AND updated_at <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY latest_state_level DESC,
         updated_at ASC

datasets.name: 0ac0bb93
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_id as `Pipeline Id`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_type as `Pipeline Type`,
       tags_map as `Pipeline Tags`
FROM monitored_pipelines
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: 7103e200
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       ts.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       ts.latest_state_with_color as `Table State`,
       ifnull(ts.latest_error_code, '') as `Error Code`,
       ts.latest_error_time as `Error Time`,
       ifnull(ts.latest_error_message, '') as `Error Message`,
       ifnull(ts.latest_error_log_message, '') as `Error Message in Log`,
       table_schema as `Latest Schema`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Run Create Time`,
       end_time as `Pipeline Run End Time`,
       prs.latest_state_with_color as `Pipeline Run State`,
       ts.updated_at as `Last Updated`
FROM table_status_per_pipeline_run AS ts
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status AS prs USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id) 
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (ts.updated_at >= :event_range.min AND ts.updated_at <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY create_time DESC,
         ts.updated_at DESC

queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ew.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,

datasets.name: 8db826d7
queryLines:
SELECT DISTINCT table_name
FROM monitored_tables JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE (table_name is not NULL)
      AND (table_name NOT LIKE '%.cdc_staging_table')
      AND (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: b18ee129
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_link as `Pipeline`,
       table_name as `Target Table`
FROM monitored_tables LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE (table_name is not NULL)
      AND (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: 19d796af
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_link as `Pipeline`,
       pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline run`,
       create_time as `Create time`,
       end_time as `End time`,
       latest_state as `Status String`,
       latest_state_with_color as `Status`,
       ifnull(latest_error_log_message, '') as `Latest error log message`,
       ifnull(latest_error_message,'') as `Latest error message`,
       ifnull(latest_error_code,'<NONE>') as `Latest error code`,
       latest_error_full as `Latest full error`,
       timestampdiff(second, create_time, ifnull(end_time, current_timestamp())) AS `Total seconds`,
       timestampdiff(second, create_time, initialization_start_time) AS `Starting seconds`,
       timestampdiff(second, initialization_start_time, running_start_time) AS `Initialization seconds`,
       timestampdiff(second, running_start_time, ifnull(end_time, current_timestamp())) AS `Running seconds`
FROM pipeline_runs_status LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND ((create_time >= :event_range.min AND create_time <= :event_range.max )
           OR (end_time >= :event_range.min AND end_time <= :event_range.max))
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY create_time DESC

datasets.name: 3b8b7d86
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Start Time`,
       event_timestamp as `Error Time`,
       error_log_message as `Error Log Message`,
       error_message as `Error Message`,
       ifnull(error_code, '<NONE>') as `Error Code`,
       error_full as `Error Details`
FROM events_errors AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC

datasets.name: 62d03d54
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_link as `Pipeline`,
       pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       latest_pipeline_run_link as `Latest Pipeline Run`,
       latest_pipeline_run_create_time as `Latest Create time`,
       latest_pipeline_run_end_time as `Latest End time`,
       latest_pipeline_run_state as `Latest Status String`,
       latest_pipeline_run_state_with_color as `Latest Status`,
       ifnull(latest_error_log_message, '') as `Latest error log message`,
       ifnull(latest_error_message,'') as `Latest error message`,
       ifnull(latest_error_code,'') as `Latest error code`,
       ifnull(latest_pipeline_run_num_errors, 0) as `Latest run errors`,
       ifnull(latest_pipeline_run_num_warnings, 0) as `Latest run warnings`,
       timestampdiff(second, latest_pipeline_run_create_time, ifnull(latest_pipeline_run_end_time, current_timestamp())) AS `Latest Total Seconds`,
       updated_at as `Last Updated`
FROM pipelines_status LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE (:pipeline_id = 'All' OR pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
      AND ((latest_pipeline_run_create_time >= :event_range.min AND latest_pipeline_run_create_time <= :event_range.max )
           OR (latest_pipeline_run_end_time >= :event_range.min AND latest_pipeline_run_end_time <= :event_range.max))
      AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
           OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
           OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY latest_pipeline_run_state_level DESC , 
         latest_pipeline_run_create_time DESC

datasets.name: b72dbc41
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       event_timestamp as `Event Time`,
       ifnull(backlog_bytes, 0) as `Backlog Bytes`,
       ifnull(backlog_records, 0) as `Backlog Rows`,
       ifnull(backlog_files, 0) as `Backlog Files`,
       ifnull(backlog_seconds, 0) as `Backlog Seconds`
FROM events_table_metrics AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
     AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
          OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
          OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))

datasets.name: e9270b22
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       teec.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Start Time`,
       expectation_name as `Expectation Name`,
       num_passed as `Rows Passed`,
       num_failed as `Rows Failed`,
       failure_pct as `Failure Percentage`,
       event_timestamp as `Check Time`
FROM table_events_expectation_checks AS teec
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC

datasets.name: f786fd7e
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       teec.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       create_time as `Pipeline Start Time`,
       expectation_name as `Expectation Name`,
       num_passed as `Rows Passed`,
       num_failed as `Rows Failed`,
       failure_pct as `Failure Percentage`,
       event_timestamp as `Check Time`
FROM table_events_expectation_checks AS teec
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
     LEFT JOIN pipeline_runs_status USING (pipeline_id, pipeline_run_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND num_failed > 0
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC

datasets.name: bc1ad993
queryLines:
SELECT pipeline_name as `Pipeline Name`,
       pipeline_link as `Pipeline Link`,
       pipeline_run_id as `Pipeline Run Id`,
       ee.pipeline_run_link as `Pipeline Run`,
       table_name as `Target Table`,
       event_timestamp as `Event Time`,
       ifnull(num_expectation_dropped_records, 0) as `Expectations Dropped Rows`
FROM events_table_metrics AS ee
     LEFT JOIN monitored_pipelines USING (pipeline_id)
WHERE  
    (:pipeline_id = 'All' or pipeline_id = :pipeline_id)
    AND (event_timestamp >= :event_range.min AND event_timestamp <= :event_range.max)
    AND (:table_name = 'All' OR table_name = :table_name)
    AND table_name is NOT NULL
    AND ((:pipeline_tag_value = '<All>')
        OR (:pipeline_tag_value = '<None>' and (tags_array IS NULL or array_size(tags_array) = 0))
        OR (array_contains(tags_array, :pipeline_tag_value)))
ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
